mean_cn: n. 传输，传播，播送，变速器
mean_en: the act or process of sending out an electronic signal or message or of broadcasting a radio or television programme
word_etyma: transmi传送 + ss + ion名词后缀 → transmission 传送
sentence: The wire on his head is used for the transmission of signals.
sentence_trans: 宝宝头上的天线是用来传送信号的。
